review: I bought Chromecast because I have subscription to educational video site lynda.com. This is the only on screen streaming device they support. It works really great with their service. I can control the videos using my phone as the remote control and i can follow along the software tutorials on my laptop. Netflix seems to work fine. Most of the apps are also available on my Roku Player so i have no plans on using chromecast for these
